title: Channeling Spirit Guides - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/12/21
itunes:title: Channeling Spirit Guides - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/12/21
description:
George Noory and spirit communicator Karen Dahlman discuss her lifelong connection with spirit guides, if the spirit guides are actually guardian angels, and whether it's dangerous to channel beings on the other side using a ouija board.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
